channel.title: Aesthetic Realm - Most unique NR remake
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/QFtJjDc.png[/img][/CENTER]
[ADMIN=Links]Aesthetic-realm.org Aesthetic-realm.org/vote[/ADMIN] [ADMIN=Features] - Flawless PKing and PvMing - Nex - Full Screen - Nex Maps - HD 525 Maps - New Contex Menus - Better Player Lighting - Tweening - Necro - Gano - Avatar of Creation - DDOS Protect - Jungle Demons - 40 on daily - No down time - No lag - Active forums - Friendly and helpful staff team - Growing community - Perfected duel arena - Returns on double deaths - Frequent updates - Custom Premium and Respected Premium islands - Custom Ganodermic Beast minigame - Custom voting reward system - Wilderness bounties with rewards - Ganodermic armours - Nex armours - PvP armours - Revenanents that drop Corrupt PvP armours - Active single and multi clans - Fully working spirit shields - Strong and stable economy [/ADMIN]
[ADMIN=Why join?]We are ready to say that Aesthetic- Realm is the most unique NR remake that has a close community of caring people. Here at AR we strive for perfection, stabily, and quality. We have updates almost everyday with a Mod weekend every weekend. Our staff here will always help you out when ever you have questions or concerns[/ADMIN]
[ADMIN=Full screen client] [/ADMIN] [img]http://i.imgur.com/lncPZR5.png[/img] [ADMIN=New pking skill] [/ADMIN] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QbGiYB0.png[/img] [ADMIN=Summoning Support] [/ADMIN] [img]http://i.imgur.com/q7exIE5.png[/img] [ADMIN=Raid minigame]Custom raid minigame that gives you points every time you kill a world boss, then spend it at this store[/ADMIN] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZNjqvnE.png[/img] [ADMIN=Key minigame]Collect keys through pvm or pvp to gain special rewards from mystery chest[/ADMIN] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gTIN791.png[/img]
[ADMIN=Necro]Necro boss that is the first boss any player should fight, drops 5 drops at once for top 5 people who do highest damage.[/ADMIN]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/PXKnu2k.png[/img]
[ADMIN=skilling area]Skilling area of coarse for the skillers[/ADMIN]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/tG1JvKC.png[/img]
[ADMIN=New hybrid armour]New hybrid armour aquired by killing zombies at far wilderness[/ADMIN]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1T1DZb0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZJKfVyP.png[/img]
[url=http://i.imgur.com/ZNjqvnE.png]http://i.imgur.com/ZNjqvnE.png[/url]

item.title: Aesthetic Realm - Most unique NR remake
item.dc:creator: @aesthetic-realm aesthetic-realm
item.description:
@aesthetic-realm wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]

[ADMIN=Links]Aesthetic-realm.org
Aesthetic-realm.org/vote[/ADMIN]
[ADMIN=Features]

  • Flawless PKing and PvMing
  • Nex
  • Full Screen
  • Nex Maps
  • HD 525 Maps
  • New Contex Menus
  • Better Player Lighting
  • Tweening
  • Necro
  • Gano
  • Avatar of Creation
  • DDOS Protect
  • Jungle Demons
  • 40 on daily
  • No down time
  • No lag
  • Active forums
  • Friendly and helpful staff team
  • Growing community
  • Perfected duel arena
  • Returns on double deaths
  • Frequent updates
  • Custom Premium and Respected Premium islands
  • Custom Ganodermic Beast minigame
  • Custom voting reward system
  • Wilderness bounties with rewards
  • Ganodermic armours
  • Nex armours
  • PvP armours
  • Revenanents that drop Corrupt PvP armours
  • Active single and multi clans
  • Fully working spirit shields
  • Strong and stable economy
    [/ADMIN]

[ADMIN=Why join?]We are ready to say that Aesthetic- Realm is the most unique NR remake that has a close community of caring people. Here at AR we strive for perfection, stabily, and quality. We have updates almost everyday with a Mod weekend every weekend. Our staff here will always help you out when ever you have questions or concerns[/ADMIN]
